title: Display uploaded ministry seals on the website

requirements.text: Add a new "Ministry Seals" section to the Our Ministries page that visibly displays the uploaded ministry seal images in a responsive grid (clickable to view larger).

quotes: Where's our SEALs at for the web page? I don't see them on the web page. Can you update it?

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /ministries shows a clearly labeled "Ministry Seals" section.

The section displays the uploaded seal artwork image(s) (at minimum the combined-seals image "ChatGPT Image Feb 5, 2026 at 11_34_19 PM.png" and its duplicates if retained) as actual images (not broken links).
The seal images render in a responsive layout (1 column on mobile, 2+ columns on larger screens) and do not overflow the page.
Each seal image has meaningful alt text and can be clicked to view a larger version (new tab or lightbox-style overlay).

requirements.text: Ensure all uploaded seal-related image assets are included in the frontend as static files and referenced using stable public paths so they load reliably in production builds.

quotes: All right, these are the ministry seals.

acceptanceCriteria: The following uploaded files are present in the frontend static assets and can be loaded directly by URL in the deployed site build: F0B90583-110F-4D38-A623-55660CA4DF70.png, The Gathering at 6 launch service.png, ChatGPT Image Feb 5, 2026 at 11_34_19 PM.png, church.png, save the date with us.png, save the date with us-1.png, The Gathering at 6 launch service-1.png, F0B90583-110F-4D38-A623-55660CA4DF70-1.png, church-1.png, ChatGPT Image Feb 5, 2026 at 11_34_19 PM-1.png, save the date with us-2.png, church-2.png, The Gathering at 6 launch service-2.png, F0B90583-110F-4D38-A623-55660CA4DF70-2.png, ChatGPT Image Feb 5, 2026 at 11_34_19 PM-2.png.
No image included in the "Ministry Seals" section 404s or renders as a broken image in the browser.

Image file names with spaces (e.g., "The Gathering at 6 launch service.png") are handled so they load correctly (either by renaming to URL-safe names and updating references, or by correct URL encoding).

constraints: Frontend paths listed as immutable must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui (compose only).
Do not add or require any backend changes for displaying images; images must be served as static frontend assets.
nonGoals: Do not redesign the overall site navigation, routing, or existing page content beyond adding the requested seal visibility.
Do not implement a CMS or admin uploader as part of this request.
